type: Bi-Metal Tags with stock marking for CF942
short_summary: Document notices related to a joint Federal- Provincial agreement.
description: bid for the supply of bi-metallic stock tags CF942 with stock marking in the national defense at the correct price.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Official Title
Tag, Stock, Marking, CF942

## Summary
The Government of Canada has a requirement for the procurement of metal tags with stock marking. The Department of National Defence is issuing a tender for the supply of these items.

## Tender Number and Status
* Tender Number: W8486-238972/A
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: 2023-02-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-12T14:00:00 (expired)
* Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Authority to Negotiate: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Language of Document: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

## Required Items
The following items are required:

* Item 1:
	+ GSIN: 9905MB
	+ NSN: 9905-21-872-2435
	+ Quantity: 60,000 pieces
	+ Unit of Issue: Piece (item to be delivered to CFSD Montreal)
* Item 2:
	+ GSIN: 9905MB
	+ NSN: 9905-21-872-2435
	+ Quantity: 30,000 pieces
	+ Unit of Issue: Piece (item to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton)

## Locations for Delivery
* Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E, Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9
* Department of National Defence, 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5

## Submission Requirements and Contact Information
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Contact Deborah Moldowan at 819-939-0832 or [deborah.moldowan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:deborah.moldowan@forces.gc.ca)

## Notice URL and Attachments
* Notice URL: None
* Attachments: Please refer to the following links for attachments:
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents
